B

bitDepth - Variable in class ar.com.hjg.pngj.ImageInfo
Bits per sample in the buffer This is 8-6 for RGB true color and grayscale imags For indexed images, number of bits per palette index (1 2 4 8)
bitDepth - Variable in class ar.com.hjg.pngj.ImageLine
copied from imgInfo
bytesPixel - Variable in class ar.com.hjg.pngj.ImageInfo
Bytes used for each pixel in the buffer equals channel * bitDepth/8 (ONLY MAKES SENSE FOR bitDepth=8,16!!!!)

Simple immutable wrapper for basic image info Some parameters are clearly redundant The constructor requires an 'ortogonal' subset

Reads a PNG image, line by line

R

read(byte[], int, int) - Method in class ar.com.hjg.pngj.PngIDatChunkInputStream
puede devolver menos que len. pero nunca 0 -1 significa que termino "pseudo archivo" prematuramente. notar que eso es un error en nuestro caso

readBytes(InputStream, byte[], int, int) - Static method in class ar.com.hjg.pngj.PngHelper
guaranteed to read exactly len bytes. throws error if it cant
readChunk(InputStream) - Method in class ar.com.hjg.pngj.PngChunk
llamar con is despues del chunkid. ojo: usar solo para chunk cortos!
readChunk(InputStream, byte[], int, int, byte[], CRC32) - Static method in class ar.com.hjg.pngj.PngHelper
Lee un chunk completo Se supone que ya hemos leido el largo y el tipo de chunk (sigue el dato y el crc) Devuelve copia el contenido en byte[] sin incluir id ni crc.

S

samplesPerRow - Variable in class ar.com.hjg.pngj.ImageInfo
Samples available for each scanline, in the buffer Equals cols x channels
scanline - Variable in class ar.com.hjg.pngj.ImageLine
scanline samples, one integer for each sample (0-255 or 0-65535) in sequence : (R G B R G B...) or (R G B A R G B A...) or (g g g ...)
setCompLevel(int) - Method in class ar.com.hjg.pngj.PngWriter
compression level: between 0 and 9 (default:6)
setDpi(Double) - Method in class ar.com.hjg.pngj.PngWriter
Set physical resolution, in DPI (dots per inch) optional, only informative
setFilterType(int) - Method in class ar.com.hjg.pngj.PngWriter
Sets filter type: the recommend is the default FILTER_PAETH If the filter is not implemented an excpetion will be thrown when writing the image.
setOverrideFile(boolean) - Method in class ar.com.hjg.pngj.PngWriter
if this is set, the file will be overwritten, if not an exception will be thrown
